import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function PostDelete(_ref){let{onClose}=_ref;const[password,setPassword]=useState('');const[error,setError]=useState('');const{postId}=useParams();// 현재 게시글의 ID 가져오기
